settings.header: 90+ Cellars Wine Club. The World of Wine, Delivered.
settings.body: There's no easier way to explore the world of wine, discover new favorites, and stock up your wine rack than with the 90+ Cellars Wine club. Our quarterly subscription ships four times per year, with your choice of 3, 6 or 12 bottles per shipment. Plus, shipping is always free and club members get additional perks like regular discounts on all wine purchases through the 90+ Cellars website.

settings.label: 3 Bottles
settings.body:
The Starter Club is the perfect way to begin your exploration. Each shipment includes 3 bottles -- including red, white and the occasional sparkling or rosé. Every shipment has at least 1-2 Reserve selections.

Save up to 15%

settings.label: 6 or 12 bottles
settings.body:
For the ultimate wanderlust who is ready to explore the entire world of wine. Choose 6 or 12 bottles of world class reds, whites and the occasional sparkling and rosé wine. All shipments include a minimum of 3-4 Reserve and Collector Series selections.

Save up to 30%

settings.label: 6 or 12 bottles
settings.body:
For those who knows what they love: red wine, and red wine only! Choose 6 or 12 bottles of world class red wines. All shipments include a minimum of 3-4 Reserve and Collector Series selections.

Save up to 30%
Members save an average of 15%-30% with each shipment.
Shipping is always included with wine club.
Be the first to get access to limited release wines that often sell out quickly.
Receive a 10% discount on all regular purchases through the 90+ Cellars website.
Sit back, relax, and let us choose our favorite wines for you every season.
Every shipment comes with a booklet to go along with the wines.

settings.header: It doesn’t have to be all about you. Gift the wine club.

settings.header: On the fence? Try our trial pack before committing.
settings.body: Get 6 of our most popular wines for $79.99 (shipping included)

settings.header: Dip your toe, buy a gift, or

settings.body: Not ready to commit to a yearly membership? Sip your way through some of the best wine regions in the world with the Trial Pack.
90+ Cellars is super! We have canceled all of our other subscriptions!!!
Perfect again! We look forward to every delivery and have never been disappointed.
Great wine, never an even average one yet, all superior!
Excellent wines, great info, great service.
Fantastic wine!! And fun to have them come to the door! We’ve loved every one of them!

A superb selection. As a wine writer and former sommelier, I was very happy to see what 90+ Cellars selected for this box. Most of it was easily paired and drank with our holiday meals. The price vs quality was also spot on. Will buy again and I highly recommend it!

It was very pleasant getting a box of wine at my door! This was a surprise gifted to me from my dad. I really like the booklet that details the wine a bit more. The wine paired excellent with what was recommended. As someone who loves wine, I don’t know much about it. It’s a great opportunity to learn, sip and enjoy!
This wine subscription was a house warming gift and what a gift it was! Each of the wines has been delicious. The wines have definitely upped our level of quality when wine buying.
We cannot be happier with the selection of wines we get from 90+ Cellars! Each bottle has been delicious and our guests love it as much as we do!
Enjoyed learning about all of the wine and suggested pairings. All wines were delicious - excited for my next delivery.

settings.question: When will I get my wine?
settings.answer:
Wine club shipments are sent quarterly, in March, June, September and December. You will receive an email approximately two weeks prior to each shipment to let you know that wines will be shipped soon. When we process your order, you will receive another email update confirming your shipment. You will then receive a final email with tracking information once your order has shipped from our third party fulfillment partner.

For new members, your first order will be processed immediately if it's within 3-4 weeks of the last seasonal shipment. Otherwise, your first shipment will ship with the next seasonal release.

settings.question: How do I change my membership club type?
settings.answer: At any time, you can log in to your account and select “Membership” to change your club type. Here, you can change your club type (Starter, White or Red Club) or bottle quantity (3, 6 or 12-bottle). Or, shoot us an email and we’re happy to make the change for you.

settings.question: Can I omit certain wines from my upcoming shipment?
settings.answer: Unfortunately, at this time we don't allow for the customization of wine club shipments.

settings.question: How does a gift membership work?
settings.answer:
You can gift wine club for 1 or 2 years of quarterly wine club shipments of any type. By selecting “Give this membership as a gift” on the signup form, you will be able to enter the details of the gift recipient. You will still be billed quarterly, when each shipment processes; however, your gift membership will be automatically terminated once the 1 or 2 year period has come to a conclusion. The gift recipient will receive the wines, however, the gift giver will be the "wine club member."

If you select “Send recipient an email” during the signup process, the gift receiver will be sent an email to let them know that you have purchased a wine club gift for them.

When orders are processed (every quarter), the gift recipient will be notified to let them know that their gift is being prepared and someone 21+ will need to sign and accept the delivery. You, as the gift giver, will also be sent an email after each wine club is processed successfully.

settings.question: Can I put my membership on hold?
settings.answer: Yes! If you’re traveling or simply need to skip a shipment, feel free to email us and we are happy to pause your membership for you.

settings.question: How do I cancel my membership?
settings.answer:
You can cancel your membership at any time. First, log in to your account and select Memberships. Scroll to the bottom of your memberships page and select "Cancel membership." If you need help canceling your membership, feel free to email us.

Please note: if a wine club shipment has already been processed and shipped to you, you will only be able to cancel your membership for the next shipment.

settings.footer_header: Still have questions? Give Us a Shout!
